sentences.en: As stupid as they appear, they're actually very good at paperwork.
sentences.cn: 他们表现得那么愚蠢, 实际上他们的报告都很好.

sentences.en: At every stage in the production there will be paperwork— forms to fill in, permissions to obtain, letters to write.
sentences.cn: 在生产的每个阶段都有文书工作——填表格，报批，写信。

sentences.en: He arranges to collect the payment from the customer, thus saving the client the paperwork.
sentences.cn: 他安排直接向顾客收取费用，免去了顾客填写各种文件的麻烦。

sentences.en: He spent evenings on paperwork when he was back home.
sentences.cn: 他回家后晚上就伏案工作.

sentences.en: I have some preliminary paperwork for you to sign.
sentences.cn: 我这有些初步的文件需要你签字.

sentences.en: I was so excited when I went to sign the paperwork I could hardly write.
sentences.cn: 去签文件时我非常兴奋，几乎无法写字。

sentences.en: If your job involves a lot of paperwork, you're going to need something to carry it all in.
sentences.cn: 如果你的工作要求做很多文字工作，你就需要有东西来装所有文件。

sentences.en: Police work involves so much paperwork these days.
sentences.cn: 如今当警察也要做这么多文书工作。

sentences.en: She had a clerical assistant to do her paperwork.
sentences.cn: 她让助手帮她做文书工作.

sentences.en: She is the best girl for the paperwork.
sentences.cn: 她是最适合做这项文书工作的女孩.

sentences.en: The amount of paperwork involved is mind-boggling.
sentences.cn: 相关的书面工作量大得令人难以想象。

sentences.en: There's a lot of paperwork involved with the shipment.
sentences.cn: 在托运时,有许多表格要填写.

sentences.en: They are regularly sent booklets about personal safety, but they barely read them as they have so much paperwork to deal with.
sentences.cn: 他们经常会收到关于人身安全问题的宣传册，但因为大量文案工作缠身，他们几乎无暇阅读。

sentences.en: Think of the savings in space and paperwork!
sentences.cn: 设想一下有多少案头工作和空间被节省下来了.

sentences.en: We're trying to cut down on the amount of paperwork involved.
sentences.cn: 我们正在努力降低有关此事的文书工作量。

sentences.en: You mind if I skip the paperwork on this?
sentences.cn: 对此我不做文书工作了,您会介意 吗 ?

trans.tran_en: work such as writing letters or reports, which must be done but is not very interesting
